name: Um Jammer Lammy
summary: Um Jammer Lammy is a rhythm-based game that takes place in the PaRappa world and tells the story of the all-girl pop rock band, MilkCan. The game has very humorous and catchy music tracks, co-op gameplay, and a plethora of unlockables.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni takes place in 1986 on October 4 and 5 on a secluded island called Rokkenjima. The head of a wealthy family named Ushiromiya Kinzou, who lives on and owns Rokkenjima, is near death, and eleven of his family members arrive on the island to discuss how Kinzou's assets will be divided once he is dead. Also on the island are five of Kinzou's servants and his physician. After the eleven family members arrive, a typhoon traps them on the island, and shortly after, people get mysteriously murdered.

name: Umbrella Corps
summary: Umbrella Corps is an online multiplayer game set in the Resident Evil universe. This fast-paced third-person shooter features quick and intense matches in compact battle zones themed from historic Resident Evil environments, such as an Umbrella Facility map.

name: Umihara Kawase
summary: Umihara Kawase is a girl who uses a fishing hook as a grappling hook. You’ll need quick reflexes to swing your way through the branching surreal environments. Use your brains to figure out the best way through. They say fish is brain food—you’re going to need it!

name: Umbrella Corps: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Join the corps! Umbrella Corps brings a competitive experience featuring new types of strategy and technique blended with elements from the world of Resident Evil, to create a unique kind of shooter!

The Deluxe Edition features a host of additional content to put you ahead of the pack, including weapons, patches, cosmetic options, emotes, and skins to turn your avatar into classic Resident Evil characters Chris, Leon, Jake, Barry, HUNK and Wesker.

name: UMA-War VR
summary: Once enter the game, you will see many UMAs in front of you. Your job is to use the bow or the crossbow to shoot the UMAs. The higher level, the more UMAs. Remember, you can only use the arrow of the same color to shoot the UMAs and you have to dodge the attack from the UMAs as well. By shooting the flying boxes, you will get many surprises such as “speed shooting”, “A flock of Arrows” and “Super bomb” which help you score more points. At last, the ranking board will allow you to compete with other players from all over the world.

name: Umbra: Shadow of Death
summary: Just as you were enjoying a walk with your sister she was kidnapped by evil space robots! Umbra: Shadow of Death is a 2d physics platform puzzle game that has seven large levels for you to conquer. It has puzzles, traps, monsters, robots, a high-performance truck and a mini-gun!

name: UMS: The Universal Military Simulator
summary: Command armies in past battles such as Gettysburg or the Battle of Hastings and in futuristic battles as well.

name: Umizuri ni Ikou!
summary: Umizuri ni Ikou! is a Sports Fishing game, published by Coconuts Japan, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Umi Tsuri Mejin: Suzuki-hen
summary: Umi Tsuri Mejin: Suzuki-hen is a Sports game, developed by A-Wave and published by Electronic Arts Victor, which was released in Japan in 1994.

name: Umi no Nushi Tsuri
summary: Umi no Nushi Tsuri is a Sports game, published by Pack-In-Video, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Umihara Kawase Portable
summary: A port of Umihara Kawase Shun for the PlayStation Portable released only in Japan.

name: Umihara Kawase Shun
summary: Umihara Kawase Shun is the second installment in the grappling hook-centric Umihara Kawase series. As in the previous game, Shun revolves around traversing levels with only a fishing rod that can attach itself to level geometry and taking advantage of physics to reach seemingly difficult places.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru is the sequel to Umineko no Naku Koro Ni. It is also referred to as When They Cry 4 in the overall When They Cry franchise.

name: Umesawa Yukari no Igo Seminar
summary: The illustrious Yukari Umesawa teaches players to play Go.

name: Umi no Nushi Tsuri 2
summary: Umi no Nushi Tsuri 2 is the portable follow-up to the SNES original.

name: Umi no Nushi Tsuri: Takara-jima ni Mukatte
summary: Umi no Nushi Tsuri: Takara-jima ni Mukatte is the sole PlayStation family entry in the Umi no Nushi Tsuri series.

name: Umisho
summary: A visual novel based on the Kenko Zenrakei Suieibu Umisho manga, about the wacky swim team at the Umineko Shougyou High School.

name: Umihara Kawase Shun: Second Edition Complete
summary: Both the Super Famicom and PlayStation games are present, along with some extra levels, and wireless exchange of data is also supported.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Portable 1
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Portable 1 is the first of two ports of the PlayStation 3 remake of Umineko no Naku Koro ni to the PlayStation Portable. It covers the Legend of the Golden Witch and Turn of the Golden Witch episodes.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Portable 2
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Portable 2 is the second and final port of the PlayStation 3 remake of Umineko no Naku Koro ni to the PlayStation Portable. It covers the Banquet of the Golden Witch and Alliance of the Golden Witch episodes.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Majo to Suiri no Rinbukyoku
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Majo to Suiri no Rinbukyoku is a remake of the Question Arcs episodes of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for the Playstation 3 by Alchemist. It contains an entirely new character sprite set with additional poses and expressions, the addition of CGs, additional visual effects, the addition of voice acting, and a new opening video.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru: Episode 8 - Twilight of the Golden Witch
summary:
Twilight of the Golden Witch is the eighth arc of the Umineko no Naku Koro ni series as well as the fourth and final arc of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru. The story follows Ange Ushiromiya as she is pulled between the whims of two Game Masters: Battler and Bernkastel.

The original release of Twilight of the Golden Witch contains the previous 3 episodes. In other words, it is effectively the full Chiru release.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 4 - Alliance of the Golden Witch
summary:
Alliance of the Golden Witch is the fourth arc in Umineko no Naku Koro ni and the final arc of the original Umineko no Naku Koro ni visual novel. It introduces the character of Ange Ushiromiya and follows her quest to discover the truth of the Rokkenjima massacre.

The game was bundled with the first three episodes and was the first game to hold the full Umineko no Naku Koro ni / When They Cry 3 set of games.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru: Episode 5 - End of the Golden Witch
summary: End of the Golden Witch is the fifth arc in Umineko no Naku Koro ni and the first arc of Chiru. The story primarily follows Natsuhi Ushiromiya as she attempts to cover up for the sudden death of Kinzo Ushiromiya.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 3 - Banquet of the Golden Witch
summary: Banquet of the Golden Witch is the third arc in Umineko no Naku Koro ni. The story focuses largely on Eva Ushiromiya and her relationship with both herself and her family.

name: U-Move Super Sports
summary:
Built around 15 entertaining mini-games and with a host of smaller fun asides, U Move Super Sports literally drops the player into a series of madcap sporting scenarios. Sony's innovative EyeToy USB Camera is used to place the player on the screen as they take part in games requiring a series of physical movements from players.

U Move Super Sports features mini-games including Perfect Goal, where the player lines up to save a penalty against a CPU striker, Hole in One a brilliant golf simulation and Rugby Crash, wherein players must physically tackle a rugby player. Additional games include Ball-Tossing Aliens, a second football mini-game called Yellow Card, and Sling Shot all of which will test the player's reflexes to their limits. As an aside to the fun of the sub-games, U Move Super Sports also boasts a number of sub-stages within the game's 'Art Studio' mode that introduces a more puzzle-based aspect to the game.

name: UMS: The Universal Military Simulator - The American Civil War
UMS: The Universal Military Simulator - Vietnam
UMS II: Nations at War
summary: Muvh like the original UMS, this sequel boasts better graphics and has different scenarios such as Waterloo, Invasion of Normandy etc.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Answer Arcs
summary: This is the second half of the Umineko When They Cry sound novel series, featuring episodes 5 through 8. This version features multi-language options, swappable renewed character sprites, as well as the original BGMs and un-cut content.

name: Umineko: Golden Fantasia
summary: The tag-team fighting game based on the original "Umineko When They Cry" series, finally released on Steam, in English and with improved rollback netplay!

name: Umihara Kawase: Shun - Second Edition
summary: The second edition of Umihara Kawase: Shun was launched almost three years after original release at a lower price as part of the Maruan series. This release contains five additional fields taking the total to fifty five. The game's cut-scenes have been replaced with scrollable, static art of the protagonist, however, due to the removal of all Mitchell branding.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 2 - Turn of the Golden Witch
summary: Turn of the Golden Witch is the second arc in Umineko no Naku Koro ni. The arc follows Battler Ushiromiya and Beatrice as they battle over the existence of magic. This is the first arc wherein the "alternate existence" versions of characters from Rokkenjima make an appearance. The story focuses heavily on Rosa Ushiromiya and Shannon.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru: Episode 6 - Dawn of the Golden Witch
summary: Dawn of the Golden Witch is the sixth arc in Umineko no Naku Koro ni and the second arc of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru. The story follows Battler's game as narrated by Ange Ushiromiya to Featherine Augustus Aurora. The story focuses heavily on the romantic relationships of Shannon, Kanon, and Beatrice.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 1 - Legend of the Golden Witch
summary:
Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Legend of the Golden Witch is the first episode of the murder mystery sound novel by 07th Expansion, creators of the Higurashi series. This installment serves as an introduction to the Umineko series.

It is the first of four Question Arcs and is followed by Turn of the Golden Witch.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru: Episode 7 - Requiem of the Golden Witch
summary: Requiem of the Golden Witch is the seventh arc in Umineko no Naku Koro ni and the third arc of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru. The story follows Willard H. Wright and Lion Ushiromiya as they attempt to solve a new game designed by Bernkastel. The story is primarily focused on the history and parentage of the person known as Yasuda.

name: Umineko: Ougon Musou Kyoku - Cross
summary:
A tag-team fighting game based around the Umineko no Naku Koro ni universe of visual novels, Cross is the followup to 2010's Ougon Musou Kyoku.

In this version George, Jessica, and Rosa from the Ushiromiya family join the fray.

name: Umpire Simulator
summary: Umpire Simulator gives you the MLB umpire experience, making tough calls at 75-105 mph. Supports all VR headsets, and also Non-VR play.

name: Umihara Kawase Shun: Steam Edition
summary: Umihara Kawase is a girl who uses a fishing hook as a grappling hook. You’ll need quick reflexes to swing your way through the branching surreal environments. Use your brains to figure out the best way through. They say fish is brain food—you’re going to need it!

name: Umiro
summary: Huey and Satura find themselves lost in the colorless world of Umiro with no memory of their past or how they arrived in this mysterious place.

name: Umamusume: Pretty Derby
summary: Umamusume: Pretty Derby is ready to race! Scout featured trainees and supporters as you navigate the immersive sports life simulation through the game's in-depth training system and top-of-the-line 3D graphics!

name: Umihara Kawase Fresh!
summary: Umihara Kawase is an action game series where the player controls protagonist Umihara Kawase to reach the end of each level. The game is highlighted by its rubber ring action in which the player uses an elastic rope to progress.

name: Umfend
summary: The glass sphere burst in the night of 1996. The world of distortion opened its gates and took away from you someone very important. However, in 2005, the past emerges again to hunt you once more. An atmospheric horror about love and time.

name: Umbrella
summary: this is the game of the girl who travels her memories. By solving the puzzles, she approach to the memories that she don't know. It is a narrative and emotional game with rain sound.

name: Umbraseal
summary: All enemy shoot bullets like crazy! 《Umbraseal》is a bullet-hell dungeon crawler top-down shooter. Fight your way through ever-changing dungeons by shadow ability and unique bullet.

name: Umihara Kawase BaZooKa!
summary:
At its core, Umihara Kawase Bazooka!! is a fixed screen action game. Perform combos with the new “Bazooka” action and aim for the high score. With over 40 stages (planned), plenty of challenge awaits. Up to four players can play together in local cooperative or hindrance play.

The game also offers a versus battle mode. Up to four players can play against each other, locally or online, and aim for victory in nonsensical battles. (Network support requires a subscription to the respective platform’s online service.)

Original characters, as well as the forefront of Success Corporation and Studio Saizensen characters, will join the fray one after another!

name: Umiuru to Sudoku Shiyo!
summary: Umiuru to Sudoku Shiyo! is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Genterprise, which was released in Japan in 2008.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Question Arcs
summary: Welcome to the world of "Umineko When They Cry" (When Seagulls Cry). Welcome to the Rokkenjima of October 4, 1986. You have been given a chance to catch a glimpse of the family conference held annually by the Ushiromiya family.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa is a collection of visual novel adaptations of short stories previously released as booklets. It is officially subtitled When They Cry 4+ and released on the same day with Twilight of the Golden Witch and Golden Fantasia as a bonus disc.

name: Umai
summary: Chain Sushi together to get combos and a high score - and try to avoid the poisonous ones, they don't taste very good. The rainbow ones, however, are quite delicious.

name: Umurangi Generation
summary: Umurangi Generation is a first person photography game in the shitty future. Set in Tauranga Aotearoa off the back of an impending crisis you are a courier for the Tauranga Express. Along the way you take photos to make ends meet. Throughout the game you will unlock a variety of lenses and equipment.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru: Shinjitsu to Gensou no Nocturne
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru: Shinjitsu to Gensou no Nocturne is a remake of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru for the Playstation 3 by Alchemist. It includes an entirely new character sprite set with additional poses and expressions, the addition of CGs, additional visual effects, the addition of voice acting, and new opening videos.

name: Umurangi Generation: Macro
summary:
Due to the surface being in constant chaos and uncertainty many of the worlds elite were able to secure themselves comfort from the ongoing crisis above. A new area, Tauranga Underground City has been added, which opens up the following 3 stages for photography:

・Gamers Palace:
Forget your worries in a top of the line Gaming Bar and VR Arcade.
・UN Hangar:
Uncover the truth the UN doesn’t want you to know.
・The Depths:
A tent city where the air is thick with the smell of grease and toxic sludge.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku is a remake that bundles the base games with new content as well as all the extra arcs in Tsubasa, Hane, PC release of Saku and two brand new ones.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku - Limited Edition
summary: This edition includes the game Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku, Witches Acrylic Stand, Portrait Art Collection, Golden Butterfly Pin Badge, One-Winged Eagle Coaster.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Hane
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Hane is a collection of visual novel adaptations of short stories previously released as booklets and officially subtitled When They Cry 4+, just like the previously released Tsubasa. It was released alongside Golden Fantasia Cross.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku is a collection that contains all released visual novel content for the series thus far, as well as some additional content.

name: Umatarou Gennarin Daibouken
summary: Umatarou Gennarin Daibouken is a game made with RPG Tsukuuru Super Dante and released for the Satellaview as a stand-alone game.

name: Umurangi Generation: Special Edition
summary: Umurangi Generation is a first person photography game in the retro future. Set in Tauranga Aotearoa off the back of an impending crisis you are a courier for the Tauranga Express. Throughout the game you will unlock a variety of lenses and equipment.

name: Umami Grove
summary: Umami Grove is a relaxed, physics-based VR adventure game with a plethora of creatures to meet and places to explore. Jump, climb, duck, and swing your way though a unique cooking adventure using a powerful movement and interaction system.

name: Umbra: Journey Home
summary: Umbra: Journey Home is a single-player, 3D puzzle game. Entering lights will cause you to lose control. Create shadows by moving objects in your environment to pass through. Adventure through a mysterious world to discover answers.

name: Umbrella Basketball
summary:
Umbrella Basketball is an arcade game of skill where you control an umbrella who needs to score some baskets.
Beware though, it’s not as easy as it seems and do know that you will fail a lot.
Play through 120 levels on this and see if you can make it to the end!

name: Umbra Lumen
summary: A mysterious atmospheric top-down indie experience game made in 7 days.

name: Uma Casa Que Não é Sua
Umineko Redacted: Some Kind of Sunny Little Dream
summary: A curious Forgery.

name: Umbral
summary: Umbral is a surreal single-player puzzle game that explores the interactions of shadow, light, and space.

name: Umille
summary: Un prototipo, un idea di quello che potrebbe essere un RPG classico con le meccaniche di un Souls-like. Questo gioco si concentra soprattutto sulla storia che viene narrata in poche righe di dialogo e sta al giocatore capire come stanno le cose...

name: Umbra Galaxy
summary: Umbra Galaxy is a sci-fi shoot'em'up where you pilot a spaceship adrift in the restricted space filled with enemies. Destroy enemy generators, fight your way to the bosses and secure the obscure goal in the end!

name: Umichan Sorani
summary: Take the role of Zytra, a busty girl trying to get money for her sister. Will you help her get it the easy way? Or the sleazy way?

name: Umbra
summary:
Umbra is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Scott, a boy who gets trapped inside his home due to a storm. The main focus of the game is exploring his dream world.

Umbra is the first game to use talk sprites, as well as the first to make dialogue an important gameplay element. The gameplay is traditional where the player is collecting effects, but with more puzzles and having dialogue choices affect the game.

name: Umbral Omen
summary: Umbral Omen is a mystical puzzle game that generates a unique problem to decipher every time you play! Read the clues carefully in order to place the correct runes in the right spots and unravel the riddle of the Umbral Omen!

name: Umbilical
summary: Umbilical is a Metroidvania-inspired top-down shooter that has you exploring an inhospitable world to stop some nasty parasites from wreaking havoc. Face off against hordes of creatures, seek out new abilities and upgrades, and take down powerful bosses as you fight to stop the parasites.

name: Umami Island
summary: Umami Island is an adventure game where the player is stuck on a mysterious island and is trying to find their way back home.

name: Umbara the Indonesian Child
summary: Umbara the Indonesian Child Educational Game is an adventure game for a child named Umbara who wants to complete a mission to learn about cultural diversity, especially traditional houses and traditional clothes by traveling around Indonesia. This game is intended to make fourth grade elementary school students able to learn about Indonesian Cultural Diversity, especially traditional houses and provincial traditional clothes throughout Indonesia in an easy, practical, interesting, and fun way.

name: Umihara Kawase: Christmas Community Challenge
summary: A collaborative hack made in 2019 for the 25th Anniversary of the SNES game.

name: Umokay 64DS
summary:
Umokay 64DS is a romhack of Super Mario 64 DS based on a discord emote called umokay and its many variations.

It is a series of minihacks each containing several levels to explore and a custom final boss to offer. Each installment's story is a follow up to the previous.

name: Umokay 64DS 2
summary:
Umokay 64DS 2 is the sequel to Umokay 64DS, which is a romhack of Super Mario 64 DS, based on a discord emote called umokay and its many variations.

There are multiple levels to explore and a custom final boss to offer. Each installment's story is a follow up to the previous.

name: Umokay 64DS 3: Travel in Time
summary:
Umokay 64 DS 3 is the third installment of the Umokay 64DS series, it is a series of minihacks each containing several levels to explore and a custom final boss to offer. Each installment's story is a follow up to the previous.

It is a hack of Super Mario 64 DS, based on a discord emote called umokay and its many variations.

name: Umokay 64DS 4: The IceFire War
summary:
Umokay 64DS 4: The IceFire War is a romhack of Super Mario 64 DS based on a discord emote called umokay and its many variations.

It is the fourth installment of the umokay ds series, a series of minihacks each containing several levels to explore and a custom final boss to offer. Each installment's story is a follow up to the previous.

name: Umokay 64DS 5: Eternal Night
summary: Umokay 64DS 5: Eternal Night is the fifth installment of the Umokay DS series. It is a romhack of Super Mario 64 DS, based on a Discord emote called Umokay and its many variations.

name: Umbra Sepulcri
summary: As a necromancer you need to gather the souls of the dead, witness their last moments of life and use their power to defeat your enemies, in this Story-driven/Action/Metroidvania inspired game, set in a beautiful hand-drawn 2D world.

name: Umbral Soul
summary: Umbral Soul is a dark fantasy RPG made in RPG Maker VX Ace.

name: Umbral Core
summary: Umbral Core is a 2.5D fighting game set in a world of dark high fantasy. It features rollback netcode, uncapped FPS, engaging combat mechanics for players across all skill levels and lots of customization options. Kickstarter and public demo coming soon!

name: Umbra
summary: Being hopeless is the feeling you will encounter when you see the dreadful horrors that you will have to face in Umbra, an abyss where the worst horrors that a human can imagine reside, do you dare to face them?

name: Umigame
summary: Fight your way out of the Haunted Swamp in this coop roguelite. Protect the Omnicore to dominate the fight. Control deadly turrets, learn new spells and leave your enemies in the mud !

name: Umbrella Escape
summary: Every problem has a solution!

name: Umichan Two Scoops
summary: Maiko and Pattie in a bind, their boss asked them to sell ice cream for cash at the beach but the boys are more interested in their hot bodies than cold deserts. It's your choice of what to sell!

name: Umbra Mortis
summary:
When a man is infected by a strange, devastating virus, he must find answers : what exactly is the nature of the dread infection that grips him? How is it ravaging his body? How will he face the darkening shadow that grows within?

Umbra Mortis is a Horror/Sci-fi Visual Novel from Crux Game Studios that touches on sickness, insanity, and loss, and the deepest, darkest fears that plague us.

name: Um Jammer Lammy Now
summary:
Um Jammer Lammy Now!, also known as simply the Um Jammer Lammy Arcade version, was an arcade cabinet that allowed players to play Um Jammer Lammy in versus mode using controllers designed as guitars; a concept later adopted by the Guitar Hero franchise.

With the help of Namco, Sony of Japan released an arcade version of Um Jammer Lammy which had updated graphics and new songs in addition to the original songs.

This 2-player arcade cabinet converts the PlayStation title into an arcade experience with a set of realistic guitar controllers. The game features three difficulty levels, three playable characters, and three game modes (Solo, Team and Battle).

It was fully discovered by r/Parappa subreddit in early 2023.

name: Umbratica Tactics
summary: Lead a squad of vampire slayers, craft a powerful deck and combine the effects of ancient relics in this turn-based tactical roguelike. Fight your way through the hordes of the undead and the unholy as you attempt to purge the evil that has taken over the once glorious land of Umbratica.

name: Umbraclaw
summary: Find hope in death. In Umbraclaw, take control of Kuon, a cat who dies in the mortal world and awakens in the Soulplane, the world of the dead. Brave the horrors of the underworld to reunite Kuon with his owner in this 2D action-adventure game.

name: UmaNetto. Full Preved!
summary: Russian point & click puzzle game, based on the animated series "UmaNetto", which is a parody of the Russian TV series "Not Be Born Beautiful" ("Не родись красивой"), a Russian version of the Colombian telenovela "Yo soy Betty, la fea" ("I am Betty, the Ugly one").

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Musu
summary: Umineko no Naku Koro ni Musu takes place in the year 1996 during a short period of time on April 14th in Skinner's home within a residential neighborhood. The principal of Springfield Elementary School named Seymour Skinner, who lives on and owns his own home in the aforementioned peaceful neighbourhood, has invited Superintendent Chalmers to his home, to enjoy a home-cooked meal of his making. After Superintendent Chalmers arrives, something goes amiss, and things don't go according to plan. Will Seymour be able to salvage this meal as well as Chalmers's perception of him?

name: UMBA
summary: 3D online magic duel (PvP), with sandbox-like Magic Lab and real time non-target combat system. The game combines exciting mix of ability to create your own spells & skills in the Magic Lab and battle it out in the magic combat.

name: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash
summary: Give heed! Our academy's time-honored Spring Fan Fest will play to a very special event! Behold, the Slapdash Grand Prix! Teams will compete in four exhilarating events! Aim for ultimate glory in Hurtling Hurdles, Blazing Baskets, Dodgeball Demolitions, and Gourmet Gauntlet!

name: Umbra of Fate
summary:
Like my last mapset, Shadows of The Nightmare Realm, the premise is inspired by H.P. Lovecraft. The story takes place many years before Doom 1, and revolves around a man (NOT the Doomguy) who is on vacation and is out enjoying a day of hunting while his wife and infant son are at home. After a long and boring day, he starts walking back to his car, only to discover a ravine that wasn't there before. Feeling an unusually strong urge to find out what lurks beyond the ravine, he jumps down into it and heads out into the dark, foggy forest night. The rest of the story is told in the level itself through additional (skippable) text.

Umbra of Fate an experimental map, where I tried to push the type of gameplay that I personally enjoy to the limit rather than trying to include something for everyone. So expect an emphasis on dark, spooky areas; intense colored lighting; an emphasis on fights with a smaller number of tough enemies; a mix of Quake, Doom 64, and Doom 3 inspired map design; and interesting boss fights. It's also one giant level, conceptually split into four areas that are roughly equal to one level each.

name: Umbral Platinum
summary: Umbral Platinum is a limit-removing project brought to you by us the Doomer Boards dungeon masters.

name: Umisen Yamasen
summary:
Main character hurries to leave home town after graduating from high school.
One day father priest sends him a telegram and asks to come back. Town has turned into an almost extinct village over this time. Father asks protagonist to get rid of the spirit of sea and mountains that drive away all the fish and attract beasts. But the way to awaken power and drive away the spirits is to have sex with them.

name: Umbra: Veins of Vengeance
summary: The world has become a desolate wasteland, where boundaries between reality and nightmare have blurred, and madness is all there is to experience. Amon Morgan, a nefarious beast who enjoys the thrill of the hunt, is back. Be ready to experience a constant state of dread.

name: Umokay 64DS 6: Wrath of the Blood Eye
Umokay 64DS 7: The Rise of a God!
Umokay 64DS X: To Infinity And Beyond!
Umbrella Drop
summary: Use umbrellas to slow your fall

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 1 - Legend of the Golden Witch
summary: A remake of the first episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 2 - Turn of the Golden Witch
summary: A remake of the second episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 3 - Banquet of the Golden Witch
summary: A remake of the third episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 4 - Alliance of the Golden Witch
summary: A remake of the fourth episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 5 - End of the Golden Witch
summary: A remake of the fifth episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 6 - Dawn of the Golden Witch
summary: A remake of the sixth episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 7 - Requiem of the Golden Witch
summary: A remake of the seventh episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Episode 8 - Twilight of the Golden Witch
summary: A remake of the eighth episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni for console releases.

name: Umbra Halloween
summary: Umbra Halloween is a surreal psychological horror game about the dead ones returning to life on a Halloween night.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 1 - Legend of the Golden Witch
summary: A remastered version of the first episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 2 - Turn of the Golden Witch
summary: A remastered version of the second episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 3 - Banquet of the Golden Witch
summary: A remastered version of the third episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 4 - Alliance of the Golden Witch
summary: A remastered version of the fourth episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 5 - End of the Golden Witch
summary: A remastered version of the fifth episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 6 - Dawn of the Golden Witch
summary: A remastered version of the sixth episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 7 - Requiem of the Golden Witch
summary: A remastered version of the seventh episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko When They Cry: Episode 8 - Twilight of the Golden Witch
summary: A remastered version of the eighth and final episode of the international release of Umineko When They Cry, developed by 07th Expansion and MangaGamer.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Aru Witch Hunter no Shuzai Tape
summary: An extra arc bundled in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku: Nekobako to Musou no Koukyoukyoku where a Witch Hunter tries to learn the method behind Kinzo Ushiromiya's wealth.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Arigato for 556
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa tells the story of a recently arrived recruit named Chiester 556 who loves thanking everybody.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Beatrice no White Day
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa tells the story of The Seven Sisters of Purgatory, who all expect to receive gifts from those they gave chocolates to, but Beatrice plans to ruin the holiday after feeling left out.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Shinjin Shisai Cornelia
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa tells the story of Cornelia, who is excited to get recruited into the Great Court of Heaven, but the workplace atmosphere is not quite what she expected.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Gisho no.XXX
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Hane where Battler Ushiromiya returns to Rokkenjima after a six-year absence, but instead of having a friendly reunion with his family, he has plans of murder. This episode explores darker themes and diverges from the canonical timeline, offering fans a speculative “what-if” story.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Game Master Battler!
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa, where after finding the truth and becoming Game Master, Battler tries to write a scenario for the next episode. As Game Master, Battler can do anything, and many people are more than willing to secure a role.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Mahou ni Tsuite no Juuyou Jikou
summary: An extra arc that is a discussion between Beatrice and Maria about the importance of magic.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Jessica to Satsujin Senpuuki
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Hane where Jessica writes a play and shows it off to Battler and Shannon when Lambdadelta interferes and sucks the three of them into it. The trio must see the story to the end if they want to escape alive.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Jessica to Koi no Omajinai
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa, where Jessica seeks the help of Zepar and Furfur once again, and this time she receives a book of spells.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Jessica no Haha no Hi Present
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko When They Cry Tsubasa where Jessica summons Zepar and Furfur to help her get a present for Natsuhi, and the results are not quite what she expected.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Kinrou Kansha no Hi no Okurimono
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where the cousins all pick out gifts to give to their parents for Labor Thanksgiving Day, but Beatrice uses her powers to sow chaos.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Last Note of the Golden Witch
summary: An extra arc originally included in the PC release of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku where Battler, Ange, and Beatrice are summoned to challenge a new opponent, Piece, who assembles a new game board and asks them to figure out her identity.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Shoukanshi Kara no Tegami
summary: An extra arc explaining the basics of magic.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Bern no Tegami
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Bernkastel writes to a friend about the rules of Beatrice's game.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Memoirs of the ΛΔ
summary: An extra arc originally included in the PC release of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku where Lambdadelta talks about the wishes she’s granted, remembering in particular the wishes of some certain little kids.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Aru Ryourinin no Zakki
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Gohda tells of the time he first signed on to serve the Ushiromiya family and the strange events he witnessed.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Warera no Kokuhaku
summary: An extra arc originally included in the PC release of Umineko no Naku Koro ni Saku, which demonstrates the creation of a new game board of Beatrice's from the ground up, showing readers how the mystery is set up and how fantasy elements are used to adorn the tale.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Sakutaro, Rengoku-san he
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Sakutaro is taken away from Maria and sent to Purgatory, where he must purify his sins if he wishes to reunite with her.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Tenshi 17-sai Higashi-shi - 44a
summary: An extra arc featuring Ange and Virgilia creating new pairings for their yaoi doujins.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Nana Shimai no Valentine
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Ronove bakes chocolate for Valentine's Day and the Seven Sisters of Purgatory seek out recipients for it.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Valentine Paper
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Battler receives letters from various characters for Valentine’s Day.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Dare no Ochakai?
summary: An extra arc originally included in Umineko no Naku Koro ni Tsubasa where Bernkastel is invited to a tea party hosted by Lambdadelta and Featherine, but traps abound.

name: Umineko no Naku Koro ni: Majo-tachi no Tanabata ha Amakunai
Umbra Fields
summary: A Black and White Choose Your Own Adventure game in the Open World of the Umbra Fields. Customize who you are between 13 distinct classes, choose what nation you wish to be in, and explore to your heart's content. Do quests, explore dungeons, fight, and discover your fate, and the fate of the world.

name: Umbral
summary: Umbral is a game focused on its own story and narrative, with a first-person view, elements of horror, exploration and puzzles. In Umbral, you take on the role of Mateus, a young adult frustrated with life who, after facing several personal problems, decides to commit suicide. However...

name: Umihara Kawase Uku
summary: Uku is a ROM hack of Umihara Kawase released on the KawaseFan.net forums.

name: Umbra: The Last Summoner
summary: As the sole summoner, step into the mystical realm of Umbra to rescue it from the encroaching demon army emerging from dimensional rifts. To end this invasion, call upon 60 diverse heroes, each with unique abilities, and engage in strategic, round-based RPG battles.

name: Umurangi Generation VR
summary:
Experience the award-winning creative sandbox photography game in VR!

Set in Tauranga, Aotearoa off the back of an impending crisis, life is bleak for those living in the city. As a courier for the Tauranga Express who is also an avid photographer, you have the freedom to travel around the city to document the impending doom through the lense of your camera.

name: Umbrella Girl
summary: Umbrella Girl is a 2D belt-scroll action adventure game. You can enjoy various actions through the character's type transformation, and become the main character to free citizens from acid rain.

name: Umineko Project
summary: The Umineko Project is an unofficial fan port that brings the PS3 remaster of Umineko no Naku Koro ni to the PC platform, with a newly-edited English translation as well as support for Russian.

name: Umezawa Yukari no Taikyoku Igo - Heisei Kiin II
summary: Full-scale Go games popularity of female professional go player, Yukari Umezawa was supervised. Introduction that explains the basics of the game of go, medium further level tactics strategy ed for up from senior, PvP and free to enjoy-to-CPU game you set the Kiryoku combat opposite station, eds., Was recorded a selection of classic name stations game record file equipped with a 4 mode of name stations appreciation ed, you can enjoy a wide range from beginner to advanced.

name: Umbra
summary: Umbra is a fantasy-style game that is story-driven with Metroid-Vania style elements, encouraging world exploration and discovery. Dive into an unforgiven world and discover the secrets behind an abandoned kingdom, and its mysterious and deceiving ruler.

name: Umichan Sentoryu
summary: In Umichan Sentoryu, you will experience the thrill of running a brothel cafe as Carl, a struggling businessman on hard times. This anime adult visual novel game offers a comedic and lighthearted story with tons of sexual situations!

name: Umigame
summary: Umigame is an explosive roguelite multiplayer adventure. Defeat challenging enemies. Protect and strategically use the Egg, a powerful artifact essential for victory. Unlock unique characters, builds, and strategies in every session.

name: Umblight
summary: Umblight is an Inscryption-like card game adventure where you're trapped in a dark, machine-filled room that changes as you go. Build your deck of shadow and light cards, make new cards by combining them and play mind-bending synergies as you try to defeat your dungeon master!

name: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash: DLC Vol. 1 - Team Iris
summary:
Additional playable characters for Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash.

Includes:
• Duramente
• Cheval Grand
• Satono Crown
• Sounds of Earth
• Royce and Royce

name: Umbra
summary: Umbra is a big, nonlinear map with a narrative underpinning it. That narrative involves, among other things, gay girls. Gameplay ranges from low-tier-enemy-heavy slaughter and microslaughter to: small-scale traps, light incidental combat, parkour/platforming, quiet exploration and secret-hunting (often there's some mix of a couple of those). UV can get quite hard. Play on HNTR or HMP unless you know you want that.

name: Umbral Astral Dreamers
summary:
In the space between the tangible and the intangible exist "a bridge" that connects both realities. This bridge is called Umbral.

The Umbral is a mysterious place protected by autonomous machines made of sand and silicon called Astrals.

You take control of Aysel, a new astral on her first mission.
What will be your mission? Can you achieve it without dying in the attempt?

name: Umbra Lumen
summary: Roguelike Deckbuilder meets puzzle gameplay. Collect tarot cards and mystic items as you face unpredictable events, meet memorable characters, and explore the beyond life. Each run is different, and every decision matters. Will you ascend or fall in this unique turn-based RPG?

name: Umami
summary: Umami is a cozy 3D food puzzle game where every level is a handcrafted, sensory experience. Tinker, rotate, and fit wooden blocks together to build mouthwatering food towers and fantastical cakes, all in a comfy atmosphere, like tidying a bento box for the soul.

name: Umbra Mortis
summary: Rise children of the almighty and be guided to your salvation. You must trek a path of mud and blood, but if you walk it together, you will surely have enough strength to tear through these beasts. Grab two friends and shoot zombies in this Venice carnival inspired shooter.

name: Umamusume Delish Derby
summary:
An Uma Musume: Pretty Derby fangame!

A small platformer similar to the gourmet race from kirby!

Try your best to get a high score!

name: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash: DLC Vol. 2 - Team Geranium
summary: Add more playable characters to your roster!

name: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash: DLC Vol. 3 - Team Primrose
summary: Add more playable characters to your roster!

name: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash Team Bundle
summary:
Can't get enough Umamusume?

Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash Team Bundle gives you access to all three DLC packs:
"DLC Vol. 1: Team Iris"
"DLC Vol. 2: Team Geranium"
"DLC Vol. 3: Team Primrose"
as well as special titles!

name: Umortis
summary: A Roguelike game where you weaponize the 4 Humours, Sensations and Emotions to survive! Create chain combos for stronger effects! Listen to a banger soundtrack!

name: Umigari
summary: UMIGARI is a first-person harpoon fishing game set in the foggy waters off the coast of Japan. Hunt fish with your harpoon, sell your catch, buy fuel, and upgrade your gear. Alone at sea, the more you explore, the stranger the fish become.

name: Umami Island
summary: Take on the role of a farmer stranded on an island with many funny looking creatures. Farm, fish, explore and do quests to uncover the big mysteries that hide behind this island! Or just relax with the cozy ambience of it!

name: Umbra Survivors
summary:
Umbra Survivors is a roguelite action survival game set in a dark fantasy world. Players fight through multiple progressively challenging stages while facing ever-growing waves of enemies.

The game combines fast-paced combat with random upgrades, card-based level-ups and dynamic scaling. Players collect weapons, passive enhancements and rare artifacts as they advance through different environments.

Each run offers new enemy compositions and risk–reward scenarios. Progression is driven by random weapon and stat rolls, supported by a variety of starting weapons and passive abilities.

Umbra Survivors draws inspiration from classic bullet-hell and roguelite mechanics, focusing on clarity, stage variety and long-term survival gameplay.

name: Umbra
summary: Fight against shadows, using shadows. Follow the journey of a child in this third-person RPG filled with unique mechanics, and find out the truth behind the shadow monsters haunting him.

name: Umi no Oh! Yah!
summary:
One of the things that really makes a difference in Umi No Oh! Yah! from the rest of fishing games is that you first select the fishing spot on the map and then you have to drive the boat until those places (there is an auto pilot mode) and we you arrive there you can start to fish.

The game features a story mode and a training mode to learn how to catch a fish. In this game to fish you don't move the rod, you move the boat.

name: Umbranomicon
summary: Umbranomicon is a full immersive experience! Because you get two in one: a VN and a fully animated dating simulator. You will have to dive into a mystical world of dangerous adventures to fight the Queen of Darkness and meet a lot of lonely girls, because men are extinct.

name: Umbra Flora
summary: In a world where green has vanished, plant, grow, and fuse plants into fearsome creatures. Lead your farm-grown warriors in a turn-based strategy fight against the forces of nature.

name: Umpteenth Photo
summary: Villagers are everywhere, and they need their photos taken. In Umpteenth Photo, you step into the worn shoes of a roaming retro photographer, snapping portraits for curious townsfolk and getting paid for every shot.
